text: Leposternon bagual is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Argentina. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 2015 Category:Taxa named by Síria Ribeiro Category:Taxa named by Alfredo P. Santos Jr. Category:Taxa named by Hussam Zaher Category:Endemic fauna of Argentina Category:Reptiles of Argentina
title: Leposternon bagual
